answers.author: Amanda Relyea
answers.text:
Hi Debi, I recommend contacting one of ICMA's Virginia Range Riders for state-specific advice. The roster is located at http://webapps.icma.org/rosters/index.cfm?roster=RR. It is probably also a good idea to let VLGMA know you are looking. Another member in transition who recently found a job suggests printing "business card resumes" to hand to colleagues at state meetings. Include your name and contact info on the front along with a brief statement explaining that you are looking for interim manager positions. On the back, provide your LinkedIn URL and consider briefly stating your experience. Finally, consider adding a sentence to the beginning of your ICMA profile that states what type of positions you are looking for. Hope this helps!

author: Debra Sandlin
text:
I am interested in learning about how to find interim manager positions and how to establish myself as a candidate for interim positions.
Debi
title: Member in transition
